Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-22872 affecting package influxdb for versions less than 2.7.5-5
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-22872 affecting package influxdb for versions less than 2.7.5-5. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package influxdb is earlier than 2.7.5-5, affected by CVE-2025-22872
